tailwindClasses.hero: flex flex-col items-center text-center pt-24 pb-0 px-4 bg-white
tailwindClasses.buttons: bg-black text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-gray-800 transition-colors
tailwindClasses.headings: font-serif text-4xl md:text-6xl text-gray-900 leading-tight mb-6

navbar.description: Minimal navbar with logo on left and 'Talk to us' button on right.
navbar.tailwindClasses: flex justify-between items-center py-6 px-8 sticky top-0 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-sm z-50

hero.description: Centered serif headline, subhead, black CTA button, followed by a large dashboard mockup on a peach gradient background.

social_proof.description: Row of grayscale client logos with 'Trusted by' label.
social_proof.tailwindClasses: py-12 border-b border-transparent flex justify-center gap-12 grayscale opacity-60

process_diagram.description: Headline about intent, followed by a complex flowchart diagram illustrating the user journey.

section_header.description: Transition headline 'Don't demo like it is 1990' introducing the feature set.

feature_on_demand.description: Text on left describing on-demand experience, UI mockup on right with peach background.
feature_on_demand.tailwindClasses: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-16 items-center py-20

feature_personalization.description: UI mockup grid of users on left, text describing personalization on right.
feature_personalization.tailwindClasses: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-16 items-center py-20

feature_multilingual.description: Text on left describing multilingual agents, world map visualization on right.
feature_multilingual.tailwindClasses: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-16 items-center py-20

feature_integrations.description: Headline 'Always in-sync with your CRM' with logos connected by dotted lines on a gradient background.
feature_integrations.tailwindClasses: py-24 bg-gradient-to-b from-orange-50/50 to-orange-100/50 rounded-3xl mx-4

testimonials.description: Three column grid of testimonials with quotes and user avatars.
testimonials.tailwindClasses: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-8 py-24 px-6

bottom_cta.description: Large sunrise gradient effect at bottom with final CTA text.
bottom_cta.tailwindClasses: pt-32 pb-48 text-center bg-gradient-to-t from-orange-200 via-orange-100 to-white

footer.description: 4-column footer with logo, links, certifications, and copyright.

inspiration.overallVibe: A sophisticated, high-end B2B SaaS aesthetic. It combines the trustworthiness of classic serif typography with the modern, approachable feel of soft peach/orange gradients and clean UI mockups. The design feels airy, premium, and human-centric.
inspiration.designNotes: The typography pairing is critical here: a high-contrast serif (like Playfair Display or similar) for headings paired with a clean geometric sans-serif for body text. The color palette relies heavily on a 'Sunset' gradient (peach to white). UI mockups are presented floating on these gradient backgrounds rather than inside hard-bordered containers.
